TextLibrary.Text: Do you have news for us?
Do you have news for us?
I have much news. Whether it is for you or not is a matter for the gods to determine.
I have much news. Whether it is for you or not is a matter for the gods to determine.
In time. It is customary to perform a task for such information.
In time. It is customary to perform a task for such information.
For gratitude. It is the way of things.
For gratitude. It is the way of things.
Very well. What do you need?
Very well. What do you need?

Although we trade with the Luminites, they are also a military force. Before the LeapGates failed, they claimed a sacred site in Ramses and named it New Aztekia. We need you to visit the site and retrieve some data for us. Elgara, my Acolyte, will assist you.

Although we trade with the Luminites, they are also a military force. Before the LeapGates failed, they claimed a sacred site in Ramses and named it New Aztekia. We need you to visit the site and retrieve some data for us. Elgara, my Acolyte, will assist you.
